transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Hello, Hi, is this Mr. Sharma?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: Yes, speaking.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Yeah, hi, this is Ravi from ABC Solutions.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Do you have a minute?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: What's this about?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Well, we sell software.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: I mean, we are an IT solutions company and we thought you might be interested.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Are you looking to buy anything?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: Not really.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: I'm busy right now, actually.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Oh, okay.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: But maybe, I mean, our product could save you money.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Probably.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: We could set a demo or something.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: What exactly does your product do?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Well, it does a lot of things.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Helps with management, I think, and analytics.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Actually, I'm pretty new here, so I don't know all the details yet.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: Look, this isn't a good time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: Maybe another time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: sure I guess

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: can I call you tomorrow

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: I'll call you if I need something

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: William: bye
